headline: 3 Unprofitable Stocks with Mounting Challenges
summary: Unprofitable companies face headwinds as they struggle to keep operating expenses under control. Some may be investing heavily, but the majority fail to convert spending into sustainable growth.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid VTRS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Viatris’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 27.7% of its value and falling to $9.10 per share. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
